page.title: 20ATTITUDES
page.content:
Although the local church is well- supported by the local community, this is so more from good will than from any deep sense of conviction and commitment. And it must also be said that despite the generosity of folk to many appeals, our attitudes are still very parochial, even though our consciences may from time to time spur us to give.
The comparatively recent advent of TV (on average for many a mere 25 years ago) has nonetheless allowed us to 'receive' information, both tragic and joyful, from all parts of the world, and yet permit us to continue to think of it all happening 'out there' with little relevance to ourselves.
It may be hoped that you in the future may a achieve a more united world.
